title: Number of MnO4- ions reacting in redox reaction

content.prompt:
MnO4− + 5 Fe2+ + 8 H+ → Mn2+ + 5 Fe3+ + 4 H2O

In the reaction represented above, the number of MnO4- ions that react must be equal to which of the following?

choices.label: One-fifth the number of Fe2+ ions that are consumed
Eight times the number of H+ ions that are consumed
Five times the number of Fe3+ ions that are produced
One-half the number of H2O molecules that are produced

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
